oai_dc:dc.dc:title: gamma-delta Routh approximation for interval systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDYOPADHYAY, B
UPADHYE, A
ISMAIL, O
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: interval system
model reduction
routh approximation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper presents the gamma-delta Routh approximation for interval systems. The interval gamma's and delta's are evaluated for the higher order interval systems, and then an rth-order approximant is obtained by retaining;he first r, interval gamma's, and delta's, A numerical example illustrates the procedure.
